result.title: Day #6
result.content:
As usual, I'm sorry for being late :/

Dynamic Programming

We solved two problems using Dynamic Programming, the first one is Chocolate Bar and the other one was MNTILE, here is the code we wrote: http://ideone.com/jb64Ry. You may also try this problem and the other problems listed at the end of MNTILE

Dynamic Programming â€” Printing the Kth solution

We solved problem Partition from SPOJ, here is the solution: http://ideone.com/VSfCdE

Sparse Table Problems

We solved a nice problem using Sparse Table to find the LCA and the Kth ancestor of a node, here is the solution: http://ideone.com/KdeO6K

Another problem we talked about: Minimum spanning tree for each edge

Finding bridges and Articulation Points (Cut Points)

We solved problem Capital City from Arabella, here is the code: http://ideone.com/sYiusc

We also talked about problem Bridges from AmmanCPC.

We didn't solve anything on Cut Points, here is a good problem from our A2OJ group: EN

Binary Search

We solved problem ACM Student Chapter (B) from PSUT Coding Marathon, the code is easy to implement, please solve it.

Greedy and Next Array

We solved problem MAX_NUM and learned two implementations for the next array, one in O(1) and the other in O(logn).

O(1) Implementation, O(logn) Implementation

Strongly Connected Components

We solved problem Dominoes from UVa, here is the code: http://ideone.com/wVT3sR

More SCC problems:

  • The Bottom of a Graph

  • Trust Groups

  • Madrids One Way Streets

  • Capital City
